English.Text: Salvation at the price of their humanity. Ignoring the begging screams of their companions, the sailors make a large detour to avoid falling into the frozen rift. As they find a beaten path heading downhill, a sailor catches up to the group, panting: he admits to having thrown pickaxes and ropes down the fault. The crew congratulates him for his selflessness, and they pretend the deed was enough to ease their conscience.
